lines.text: [Bob and Mike are carrying a very drunk Slam to the truck]
There are 2 kinds of drunks, those that are sorry and those that soon will be.

[Tim is riding in the tow truck with Slam cause Slam is towing Tim's dad's Cadillac]
Man, I feel so stupid.
Boy, you just discover the oldest sexual position in the book.

[Slam pulls the tow truck to a bowling alley and says to Tim]
You just got to remember, your brains are between your ears and not your legs.

[Mickey, the bowling alley owner comes out of the alley and Talks to Slam, he also notices Tim with the mud on him]
Slam, things are a little rough out at the speedrome tonight, huh?
My friend here had a problem out at County Line Bridge.

[Mickey makes a joke and says to Tim]
Out there baiting your hook, huh?, catch anything?

[Tim and Bonnie making love in the back seat of a Cadillac parked on the side of a stream]
Oh Tim!
Everything's moving, the whole world is moving.

[Tim looks up to see the car is sinking into the stream]
Bonnie, the whole car is moving!
